snippet: Daimler and Lagardère, along with a group of EADS executives, are accused of having known of manufacturing problems with the Airbus A380 jet when they sold shares in 2006.
abstract: French court orders German carmaker Daimler and French media conglomerate Lagardere to face criminal trial on allegations of insider trading in 2006 sale of shares in the European aerospace and defense group EADS.
lead_paragraph: Daimler and Lagardère, along with a group of EADS executives, are accused of having known of manufacturing problems with the Airbus A380 jet when they sold shares in 2006.

headline.main: French Court Orders Criminal Trial for EADS Shareholders
headline.print_headline: Trial Ordered in EADS Insider Trading Case

keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
keywords.name: organizations
